dialogue.speaker: EDDIE
dialogue.utterance: That's what I'm saying.

dialogue.speaker: EDDIE
dialogue.context: Cragie, backed up by a couple of buddies, comes up to him.
dialogue.utterance: I just dialed 348-6610, and I get this funny buzz. Check the line for me? Thanks.
dialogue.speaker: BRENNAN
dialogue.utterance: Seems to me the man's got his tongue stuck to his asshole, Cragie.
dialogue.speaker: CRAGIE
dialogue.context: They walk down the hall.
dialogue.utterance: Hey, that don't bother him. He's the fuckin White Knight. You wanna take on the whole world by yourself? Now you're gonna get your chance, Sarge.
dialogue.speaker: OPERATOR
dialogue.context: Eddie drops the phone.
dialogue.utterance: Sorry, sir, that number seems to be out of service. I've reported it.

dialogue.speaker: COP
dialogue.utterance: He was a friend of yours wasn't he?
dialogue.speaker: EDDIE
dialogue.utterance: Yeah.

dialogue.speaker: BRENNAN
dialogue.context: Music returns to the car and gets in.
dialogue.utterance: Ten-four, Dispatch. Unit 1463 responding.
dialogue.speaker: BRENNAN
dialogue.utterance: I could use a cup of coffee.

dialogue.speaker: HEAVY
dialogue.utterance: Hey, you ain't got no business back there.
dialogue.speaker: EDDIE
dialogue.context: Eddie spins with deadly precision and catches them in mid- step and they go down like gut-shot rhinos. He heads for the rear hallway and everybody clears a path. He steps up to the door in back and kicks it in.
dialogue.utterance: I want your opinion I'll beat it out of you.

dialogue.speaker: EDDIE
dialogue.utterance: Where is Luis?
dialogue.speaker: DEGAS
dialogue.context: Eddie grabs Degas by the hair and starts slamming his face into the mirror which shatters with every blow.
dialogue.utterance: Get the hell out of here.
dialogue.speaker: EDDIE
dialogue.context: He holds up Degas' head to look him in the eye. Blood and cocaine stain the man's face.
dialogue.utterance: Talk to me, Degas, or I'll hit you with so many lefts you're gonna beg for a right.
dialogue.speaker: DEGAS
dialogue.context: Eddie lifts the head once and gives Degas one punch in the face that sends him ass over teakettle across the floor.
dialogue.utterance: He's coming here. He's on his way.

dialogue.speaker: DISPATCHER
dialogue.context: The dispatcher at the next panel overhears the call.
dialogue.utterance: We need a verification on a back-up for Unit 1462...
dialogue.speaker: SECOND DISPATCHER
dialogue.context: First dispatcher nods.
dialogue.utterance: 1462. That's Cusack, right?
dialogue.speaker: SECOND DISPATCHER
dialogue.utterance: Good luck finding a backup for that character.

dialogue.speaker: DISPATCHER
dialogue.utterance: ...request verification for backup for unit 1462. Patrol 47, are you in the area.
dialogue.speaker: OFFICER
dialogue.context: Cragie smiles. Kosalas looks ashamed.
dialogue.utterance: Squad. 47. We're having vehicular problems. Not able to respond.
dialogue.speaker: DISPATCHER
dialogue.context: One cop turns to the other.
dialogue.utterance: ...need backup at 18th and Halstead...
dialogue.speaker: COP
dialogue.utterance: Fuck him.

dialogue.speaker: DONATO
dialogue.utterance: I would have been here, Sarge. They kept it from me.
dialogue.speaker: EDDIE
dialogue.context: Donato holsters his gun, and helps Eddie to his feet.
dialogue.utterance: You're Ok, Hopalong.
dialogue.speaker: DONATO
dialogue.utterance: Listen, I'm havin' a drink with this friend of mine, name of Mickie. She works on a computer over in the Federal Building, FBI. I got here as soon as I heard.
dialogue.speaker: EDDIE
dialogue.utterance: They got Diana Luna.
dialogue.speaker: DONATO
dialogue.context: Eddie runs down the alley toward his car.
dialogue.utterance: That's what I'm tryin' to tell ya. Mickie told me she read on the wire Tony Luna's comin' into Union Station at ten tonight.

dialogue.speaker: TONY LUNA
dialogue.utterance: Hello, Felix.
dialogue.speaker: SCALESE
dialogue.context: Tony moves for his gun. The hood next to Tony relieves him of his gun, using his own for persuasion.
dialogue.utterance: Hello, Tony.
dialogue.speaker: SCALESE
dialogue.utterance: You see, Tony. You make no sense. You start a war... Waste people... Money... You're like a kid, Tony. You're a bad boy. Tony is scared. The driver spots something in the rearview mirror.

dialogue.speaker: KATES
dialogue.utterance: What the hell is goin on?
dialogue.speaker: BRENNAN
dialogue.utterance: Cusack made off with a truckload of armour.
dialogue.speaker: MUSIC
dialogue.utterance: He's a fucking one man army now.
dialogue.speaker: CRAGIE
dialogue.context: Kosalas wanders through the wreckage. He is stunned. He is starting to wake up.
dialogue.utterance: What'd I tell ya. The sonofabitch is crazy.
dialogue.speaker: KATES
dialogue.context: Kosalas turns on them.
dialogue.utterance: OK, everybody. No more games. Where's Cusack. The men all look at him silently.
dialogue.speaker: KOSALAS
dialogue.context: He is mad and loud.
dialogue.utterance: I can't swallow this shit! Eddie Cusack's out there takin' on the world by himself. And you fuckin' heros are gonna sit on your goddamn asses!
dialogue.speaker: CRAGIE
dialogue.utterance: Cool it kid.
dialogue.speaker: KOSALAS
dialogue.utterance: Don't you fuckin' tell me to cool it. I won't cool it. I'm not going to fuckin' lie for you any more. I lied, Commander. He laid a gun on that kid. I saw the whole thing.
dialogue.speaker: CRAGIE
dialogue.context: Cragie jumps at Kosalas, but Kosalas is ready for him, and braces Cragie against the wall. With one hand Kosalas slams Cragie again, and reaches down with his free hand, lifting Cragie's pants leg and extracting a drop-gun from it's concealed holster.
dialogue.utterance: You little fuckin' bastard!
dialogue.speaker: KOSALAS
dialogue.context: Kates steps in and separates them.
dialogue.utterance: What's this for partner? Your next fuck up?
dialogue.speaker: KATES
dialogue.utterance: Get someone in the air. We're gonna find Cusack.

dialogue.speaker: DISPATCHER
dialogue.utterance: ...Harbor Patrol reports gunfire and explosions in the vicinity of Calumet Harbor...
dialogue.speaker: KATES
dialogue.context: Kosalas spins the wheel into a U-turn.
dialogue.utterance: That's Cusack.

dialogue.speaker: KATES
dialogue.context: There is a long pause.
dialogue.utterance: Hey, Cusack! Eddie stops, slowly turns around.
dialogue.speaker: KATES
dialogue.context: Eddie hands Diana over to the waiting medics, who put her in the ambulance. We pull back further and further until we see the rest of the Home Team. The ambulance, carrying Diana, pulls away with it's lights flashing. Eddie walks down the pier alone.
dialogue.utterance: I'm glad you don't follow orders.
